name: Don't Trust Them
description:
Run, collect coins and get the highest score possible. If you collect the red coin, you can come to them and kill them! Play NOW!

3 DAYS...

This game was created in 72 hours for BenBonk Game Jam.

WHERE YOU CAN SUPORT ME?

You can support me with subscribe on my YouTube chanel, or with follow on my Twitter, or you can visit my websites. You can donate me too!

CONTROLS
  • W, S, A, D - move
  • ESC - pause
HOW TO DOWNLOAD
  • Download .zip file
  • Place in a folder on you desktop
  • Right click > Extract Here
  • Double click on  Don'tTrustThem.exe
